mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.campaign_id AS "campaignId", a.title AS "title", a.url AS "url", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", sys_user.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user ON sys_user.id = a.update_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news( id, campaign_id, title, url, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{campaignId}, #{title}, #{url}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET campaign_id = #{campaignId}, title = #{title}, url = #{url}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
